verbose_text: To confirm these apparent differences in expression, we quantitated the distance between the corticostriatal angle and the border between the Gsx2 and Pax6 expression domains (presumptive PSPB; XREF_FIG G), revealing that this distance was indeed larger in the Plagl2 KI/KI telencephalon (n = 3; P < 0.05; XREF_FIG H).
